workflow.name: Auto-create TikTok videos with VEED.io AI avatars, ElevenLabs & GPT-4
workflow.description:
# ðŸ’¥ Viral TikTok Video Machine: Auto-Create Videos with Your AI Avatar

![Workflow Overview](https://www.dr-firas.com/workflow-veed.png)

---

### ðŸŽ¯ Who is this for?
This workflow is for **content creators, marketers, and agencies** who want to use **Veed.ioâ€™s AI avatar technology** to produce short, engaging TikTok videos automatically.  
Itâ€™s ideal for creators who want to appear on camera without recording themselves, and for teams managing multiple brands who need to generate videos at scale.

---

### âš™ï¸ What problem this workflow solves
Manually creating videos for TikTok can take hours â€” finding trends, writing scripts, recording, and editing.  
By combining **Veed.io**, **ElevenLabs**, and **GPT-4**, this workflow transforms a simple Telegram input into a **ready-to-post TikTok video** featuring your **AI avatar powered by Veed.io** â€” speaking naturally with your cloned voice.

---

### ðŸš€ What this workflow does
This automation links Veed.ioâ€™s video-generation API with multiple AI tools:
- Analyzes TikTok trends via **Perplexity AI**  
- Writes a 10-second **viral script** using **GPT-4**  
- Generates your **voiceover** via **ElevenLabs**  
- Uses **Veed.io (Fabric 1.0 via FAL.ai)** to animate your avatar and sync the lips to the voice  
- Creates an engaging **caption + hashtags** for TikTok virality  
- Publishes the video automatically via **Blotato TikTok API**  
- Logs all results to **Google Sheets** for tracking

---

### ðŸ§© Setup
1. **Telegram Bot**
   - Create your bot via [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather)
   - Configure it as the trigger for sending your **photo** and **theme**

2. **Connect Veed.io**
   - Create an account on [Veed.io](https://www.veed.io)  
   - Get your **FAL.ai API key** (Veed Fabric 1.0 model)  
   - Use HTTPS image/audio URLs compatible with Veed Fabric  

3. **Other APIs**
   - Add **Perplexity**, **ElevenLabs**, and **Blotato TikTok** keys  
   - Connect your Google Sheet for logging results  

---

### ðŸ› ï¸ How to customize this workflow
- **Change your Avatar:** Upload a new image through Telegram, and **Veed.io** will generate a new talking version automatically.  
- **Modify the Script Style:** Adjust the GPT prompt for tone (educational, funny, storytelling).  
- **Adjust Voice Tone:** Tweak **ElevenLabs** stability and similarity settings.  
- **Expand Platforms:** Add Instagram, YouTube Shorts, or X (Twitter) posting nodes.  
- **Track Performance:** Customize your Google Sheet to measure your most successful Veed.io-based videos.

---

### ðŸ§  Expected Outcome
In just a few seconds after sending your photo and theme, this workflow â€” powered by **Veed.io** â€” creates a **fully automated TikTok video** featuring your AI avatar with natural lip-sync and voice.  
The result is a continuous stream of **viral short videos**, made without cameras, editing, or effort.

---

âœ… **Import the JSON file in n8n**, add your API keys (including Veed.io via FAL.ai), and start generating viral TikTok videos starring your AI avatar today!

### ðŸŽ¥ [Watch This Tutorial](https://youtu.be/EOe7h1resHk)

![VEED logo](https://www.dr-firas.com/VEED.png)

---
ðŸ“„ **Documentation**: [Notion Guide](https://automatisation.notion.site/Viral-TikTok-Video-Machine-Auto-Create-Videos-with-Your-AI-Avatar-2943d6550fd9804a947ae762d60d76f5?source=copy_link)

### Need help customizing?
Contact me for consulting and support : [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCriIQI8uaoEro5FEnOpeidQ)

values.content:
=Based on these trends: {{ $json.choices[0].message.content }}

Create a viral 30-second maximum TikTok script about: {{ $('Extract Photo and Theme').first().json.theme }}

Requirements:
- Maximum 30 seconds when spoken
- Hook in first 2 seconds
- Engaging and conversational
- Optimized for voice synthesis
- No special characters or formatting
- Return ONLY the script text, nothing else

=Create an engaging TikTok caption for a video about: {{ $('Extract Photo and Theme').first().json.theme }}

Based on these trends: {{ $('Search Trends with Perplexity').first().json.choices[0].message.content }}

Requirements:
- Catchy hook in first line
- Include 5-8 relevant trending hashtags
- Keep it concise and engaging
- Optimize for TikTok algorithm
- Return ONLY the caption text with hashtags, nothing else

parameters.content:
# ðŸš€ VIRAL TIKTOK CREATOR - SETUP GUIDE

### ðŸŽ¥ Watch This Tutorial

@[youtube](YykmUeGVb9U)


This workflow transforms a photo + theme into viral TikTok content automatically.

ðŸ“‹ WHAT YOU NEED:
âœ“ Telegram Bot Token
âœ“ ElevenLabs API Key + Voice ID
âœ“ veed.io API Key with FAL.ai 
âœ“ Blotato API Key
âœ“ Google Sheets Document
âœ“ OpenAI API Key
âœ“ Perplexity API Key

## âš¡ Setup
1. Import this workflow into your n8n instance.  
2. Connect your Google Sheets, Gmail, and Google Calendar credentials. Tutorial: [Configure Your Google Sheets, Gmail, Calendar Credentials](https://youtu.be/fDzVmdw7bNU)  
3. Connect Your Data in Google Sheets. Data must follow this format: [Sample Sheets Data](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1G1hS5pEJb4PdPYuChl_ZLNCQNH8CaG6iSa-Ip9W1cTI/edit?usp=sharing/copy)  

---
## ðŸ“¬ Need Help or Want to Customize This?
**Contact me for consulting and support:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)

# ðŸ“± STEP 1: TELEGRAM BOT SETUP

1. Create a Telegram Bot:
   â€¢ Message @BotFather on Telegram
   â€¢ Send /newbot command
   â€¢ Follow prompts to name your bot
   â€¢ Copy the API token provided

2. Configure Telegram Trigger Node:
   â€¢ Click the "Telegram Trigger" node
   â€¢ Add Telegram credentials with your token
   â€¢ Select "Updates" to trigger on: Message, Photo
   â€¢ Save the node

3. Test:
   â€¢ Activate the workflow
   â€¢ Send a photo with caption to your bot
   â€¢ Caption = theme (e.g., "fitness motivation")

âœ… Ready when: Bot responds to messages

# ðŸ”‘ STEP 2: API KEYS CONFIGURATION

Configure the "Workflow Configuration" node with:

1. ElevenLabs (Voice Synthesis):
   â€¢ Sign up at elevenlabs.io
   â€¢ Get API key from profile settings : https://fal.ai/models/fal-ai/elevenlabs/tts/eleven-v3/api
   â€¢ Create/clone a voice, copy Voice ID
   â€¢ Replace: elevenLabsApiKey, elevenLabsVoiceId

2. FAL.ai (Video Generation):
   â€¢ Sign up at fal.ai
   â€¢ Get API key from dashboard : https://fal.ai/models/veed/fabric-1.0/playground
   â€¢ Replace: falApiKey

âœ… All keys added to Workflow Configuration node

# ðŸ¤– STEP 3: AI PROCESSING SETUP

1. Perplexity API (Trend Research):
   â€¢ Sign up at perplexity.ai
   â€¢ Get API key from settings
   â€¢ Add credentials to "Search Trends" node
   â€¢ Model: llama-3.1-sonar-large-128k-online

2. OpenAI API (Script & Caption):
   â€¢ Sign up at platform.openai.com
   â€¢ Create API key
   â€¢ Add credentials to both GPT-4 nodes:
     - "Generate Script with GPT-4"
     - "Generate Caption with GPT-4"
   â€¢ Model: gpt-4o

3. Use VEED : https://fal.ai/models/veed/fabric-1.0/api
   â€¢ Sign up at https://fal.ai/
   â€¢ Create fal API key

# ðŸŽ¬ STEP 4: VOICE & VIDEO GENERATION

These nodes are pre-configured and work automatically:

1. ElevenLabs Voice Synthesis: https://fal.ai/models/fal-ai/elevenlabs/tts/eleven-v3/api
   â€¢ Converts script to natural speech
   â€¢ Uses your cloned voice
   â€¢ Outputs MP3 audio file

2. FAL.ai Video Generation:
   â€¢ Takes your photo + audio
   â€¢ Creates talking video (lip-sync)
   â€¢ Uses VEED Fabric 1.0 model
   â€¢ Syncs mouth movements to audio

3. Download Generated Video:
   â€¢ Retrieves final video file
   â€¢ Prepares for publishing

ðŸ’¡ NO CONFIGURATION NEEDED
   Just ensure API keys are set in Step 2

âœ… Automatic processing - no action required

# ðŸ“¤ STEP 5: PUBLISHING & TRACKING

### Install the Blotato [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) Node in n8n (Community Nodes)
1. In n8n, open **Settings â†’ Community Nodes**.  
2. Click **Install**, then add: `@blotato/n8n-nodes-blotato`.  
3. Log in to **Blotato**.  
4. Go to **Settings â†’ API Keys**.  
5. In n8n â†’ **Credentials â†’ New**.  
6. Choose **Blotato API** 
(provided by the community node you installed).  

2. TikTok Publishing (Blotato):
   â€¢ Pre-configured to auto-publish
   â€¢ Uses caption from GPT-4
   â€¢ Privacy: Public
   â€¢ Requires Blotato API key from Step 2

# âš¡ HOW IT WORKS - WORKFLOW FLOW

1ï¸âƒ£ You send: Photo + Theme via Telegram
   â†“
2ï¸âƒ£ Perplexity finds: Current viral trends
   â†“
3ï¸âƒ£ GPT-4 creates: 10-second viral script
   â†“
4ï¸âƒ£ ElevenLabs generates: Voice audio (MP3)
   â†“
5ï¸âƒ£ FAL.ai creates: Talking video from photo
   â†“
6ï¸âƒ£ GPT-4 writes: Optimized caption + hashtags
   â†“
7ï¸âƒ£ Saves to: Google Sheets (tracking)
   â†“
8ï¸âƒ£ Publishes to: TikTok automatically

â±ï¸ TOTAL TIME: ~2-3 minutes
ðŸŽ¯ RESULT: Viral TikTok video published!

ðŸ’¡ USAGE:
   Send photo with caption "fitness tips"
   â†’ Get viral fitness video on TikTok
